edu.uni.GAApplication
Class RouletteSelector

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.uni.GAApplication.RouletteSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
SelectionFunction
public class RouletteSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements SelectionFunction

A supplied SelectionFunction that bases parent selection on the principles of Roulette selection. A heavier probability of selection is given to the most fit individuals. RouletteSelector is part of the strategy pattern design of GAStrategy.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Pat Burke, Ryan Dixon, Jake Good, Jayapal Prabakaran
